text:
Hi everyone,

Was interested in seeing if there are any agencies or freelancers who have experience connecting HubSpot with Delltek Maconomy (ERP) and/or Introhive (Relationship Management Tool). My firm is evaluating HubSpot as a potential marketing automation tool and I was hoping someone on this slack channel might have experience doing this.

Feel free to DM me directly. Thank you in advance!
